626900.name: My Name is You - OST
626900.description:
The soundtrack of the novel "My Name is You". Tracks of all endings and instrumental music.

Tracklist:
1. Standee – Cocaine Time
2. Mercurium – Love You To Death
3. Shortparis – Requiem
4. Shortparis – P/W
5. Mercurium – Need You
6. MSMB – Option
7. Shortparis – A Hero
8. Shortparis – Family's white silk
9. shaMankey – Escape
10. MSMB – Cocaine
11. Shortparis – White Skin
12. shaMankey – Headache (remix)
13. Denis Stelmakh – Hold Your Breath
14. Denis Stelmakh – Main theme
15. Lzhedmitry IV - Nightmare
626900.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
